mapper.select:
SELECT M.plant_id plantId, ( SELECT plant_name FROM O_2Plant WHERE id = plant_id ) plantName, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '水' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentWaterSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '水' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preWaterSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '电' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentElectricitySumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '电' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preElectricitySumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '空气' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentAirSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '空气' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preAirSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '蒸汽' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentSteamSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '蒸汽' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preSteamSumValue FROM Variable_Info M, ( SELECT TagName, ( SELECT TagValue FROM T_DayData B WHERE A.TagName = B.TagName AND CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 7 ), B.DataTime, 120 ) = CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 7 ), #{queryTime}, 120 ) AND B.DataTime = ( SELECT MAX ( C.DataTime ) FROM dbo.T_Daydata C WHERE B.tagname = C.tagname AND CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 7 ), B.DataTime, 120 ) = CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 7 ), #{queryTime}, 120 ) ) ) cur, ( SELECT TagValue FROM T_DayData D WHERE A.TagName = D.TagName AND CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 7 ), D.DataTime, 120 ) = CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 7 ), DATEADD( MONTH, - 1, #{queryTime} ), 120 ) AND D.DataTime = ( SELECT MAX ( E.DataTime ) FROM dbo.T_Daydata E WHERE D.tagname = E.tagname AND CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 7 ), E.DataTime, 120 ) = CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 7 ), DATEADD( MONTH, - 1, #{queryTime} ), 120 ) ) ) pre FROM T_DayData A GROUP BY TagName ) N
M.tag_name = N.TagName AND M.[disable] != 1 AND M.total_flag = 1
AND plant_id = #{plantId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
GROUP BY plant_id
SELECT class_id classId, class_name className, class_description classDescription FROM S_Class
SELECT energy_type_id energyTypeId, energy_type_name energyTypeName, energy_type_description energyTypeDescription FROM S_EnergyType
SELECT signal_type_id signalTypeId, signal_type_name signalTypeName, signal_type_description signalTypeDescription FROM S_SignalType
SELECT system_id systemId, system_name systemName, system_description systemDescription FROM S_System

SELECT building_id, buildingName, ( currentWaterSumValue - preWaterSumValue ) currentWaterSumValue, ( currentElectricitySumValue - preElectricitySumValue ) currentElectricitySumValue, ( currentAirSumValue - preAirSumValue ) currentAirSumValue, ( currentSteamSumValue - preSteamSumValue ) currentSteamSumValue FROM ( SELECT building_id, ( SELECT building_name FROM O_3Building WHERE id = building_id ) buildingName, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '水' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentWaterSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '水' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preWaterSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '电' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentElectricitySumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '电' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preElectricitySumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '空气' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentAirSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '空气' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preAirSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '蒸汽' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentSteamSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '蒸汽' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preSteamSumValue FROM Variable_Info M, ( SELECT TagName, ( SELECT TagValue FROM T_DayData B WHERE A.TagName = B.TagName AND B.DataTime = ( SELECT MAX ( C.DataTime ) FROM dbo.T_DayData C WHERE B.tagname = C.tagname AND YEAR(B.DataTime) = YEAR(GETDATE( )) ) ) cur, ( SELECT TagValue FROM T_DayData D WHERE A.TagName = D.TagName AND D.DataTime = ( SELECT MAX ( E.DataTime ) FROM dbo.T_DayData E WHERE D.tagname = E.tagname AND YEAR(E.DataTime) = YEAR(DATEADD( YEAR, - 1, GETDATE( ) )) ) ) pre FROM T_DayData A GROUP BY TagName ) N WHERE M.tag_name = N.TagName AND M.[disable] != 1 AND M.total_flag = 1 GROUP BY building_id ) T
AND building_id = #{buildingId, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT building_id, buildingName, ( currentWaterSumValue - preWaterSumValue ) currentWaterSumValue, ( currentElectricitySumValue - preElectricitySumValue ) currentElectricitySumValue, ( currentAirSumValue - preAirSumValue ) currentAirSumValue, ( currentSteamSumValue - preSteamSumValue ) currentSteamSumValue, ( preWaterSumValue - twoPreWaterSumValue ) preWaterSumValue, ( preElectricitySumValue - twoPreElectricitySumValue ) preElectricitySumValue, ( preAirSumValue - twoPreAirSumValue ) preAirSumValue, ( preSteamSumValue - twoPreSteamSumValue ) preSteamSumValue FROM ( SELECT building_id, ( SELECT building_name FROM O_3Building WHERE id = building_id ) buildingName, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '水' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentWaterSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '水' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preWaterSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '电' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentElectricitySumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '电' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preElectricitySumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '空气' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentAirSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '空气' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preAirSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '蒸汽' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentSteamSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '蒸汽' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preSteamSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '水' THEN N.twoPre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) twoPreWaterSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '电' THEN N.twoPre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) twoPreElectricitySumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '空气' THEN N.twoPre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) twoPreAirSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '蒸汽' THEN N.twoPre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) twoPreSteamSumValue FROM Variable_Info M, ( SELECT TagName, ( SELECT TagValue FROM T_DayData B WHERE A.TagName = B.TagName AND B.DataTime = ( SELECT MAX ( C.DataTime ) FROM dbo.T_DayData C WHERE B.tagname = C.tagname AND CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 7 ), B.DataTime, 120 ) = CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 7 ), GETDATE( ), 120 ) ) ) cur, ( SELECT TagValue FROM T_DayData D WHERE A.TagName = D.TagName AND D.DataTime = ( SELECT MAX ( E.DataTime ) FROM dbo.T_DayData E WHERE D.tagname = E.tagname AND CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 7 ), E.DataTime, 120 ) = CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 7 ), DATEADD( MONTH, - 1, GETDATE( ) ), 120 ) ) ) pre, ( SELECT TagValue FROM T_DayData D WHERE A.TagName = D.TagName AND D.DataTime = ( SELECT MAX ( E.DataTime ) FROM dbo.T_DayData E WHERE D.tagname = E.tagname AND CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 7 ), E.DataTime, 120 ) = CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 7 ), DATEADD( MONTH, - 2, GETDATE( ) ), 120 ) ) ) twoPre FROM T_DayData A GROUP BY TagName ) N WHERE M.tag_name = N.TagName AND M.[disable] != 1 AND M.total_flag = 1 GROUP BY building_id ) T
AND building_id = #{buildingId, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT building_id, buildingName, ( currentWaterSumValue - preWaterSumValue ) currentWaterSumValue, ( currentElectricitySumValue - preElectricitySumValue ) currentElectricitySumValue, ( currentAirSumValue - preAirSumValue ) currentAirSumValue, ( currentSteamSumValue - preSteamSumValue ) currentSteamSumValue FROM ( SELECT building_id, ( SELECT building_name FROM O_3Building WHERE id = building_id ) buildingName, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '水' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentWaterSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '水' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preWaterSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '电' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentElectricitySumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '电' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preElectricitySumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '空气' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentAirSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '空气' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preAirSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '蒸汽' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentSteamSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '蒸汽' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preSteamSumValue FROM Variable_Info M, ( SELECT TagName, ( SELECT TagValue FROM T_HourData B WHERE A.TagName = B.TagName AND B.DataTime = ( SELECT MAX ( C.DataTime ) FROM dbo.T_HourData C WHERE B.tagname = C.tagname AND CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 10 ), B.DataTime, 120 ) = CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 10 ), GETDATE( ), 120 ) ) ) cur, ( SELECT TagValue FROM T_HourData D WHERE A.TagName = D.TagName AND D.DataTime = ( SELECT MAX ( E.DataTime ) FROM dbo.T_HourData E WHERE D.tagname = E.tagname AND CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 10 ), E.DataTime, 120 ) = CONVERT ( VARCHAR ( 10 ), DATEADD( DAY, - 1, GETDATE( ) ), 120 ) ) ) pre FROM T_HourData A GROUP BY TagName ) N WHERE M.tag_name = N.TagName AND M.[disable] != 1 AND M.total_flag = 1 GROUP BY building_id ) T
AND building_id = #{buildingId, jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT building_id buildingId, building_name buildingName FROM building_distribution A JOIN O_3Building B ON A.building_id = B.id

SELECT A.id, A.placeholder_id placeholderId, TagName tagName, TagValue tagValue, description FROM home_page_chart_setting A, T_HourData B WHERE A.tag_name = B.TagName AND DataTime = ( SELECT MAX ( DataTime ) FROM T_HourData C WHERE B.TagName = C.TagName )

SELECT CAST( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '水' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentWaterSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '水' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preWaterSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '电' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentElectricitySumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '电' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preElectricitySumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '空气' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentAirSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '空气' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preAirSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '蒸汽' THEN N.cur ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) currentSteamSumValue, CAST ( SUM ( CASE WHEN energy_type_name = '蒸汽' THEN N.pre ELSE 0 END ) AS NUMERIC ( 20, 2 ) ) preSteamSumValue FROM Variable_Info M, ( SELECT TagName, ( SELECT TagValue FROM T_HourData B WHERE A.TagName = B.TagName AND B.DataTime = ( SELECT MAX ( C.DataTime ) FROM dbo.T_HourData C WHERE B.tagname = C.tagname AND YEAR ( B.DataTime ) = YEAR ( getDate( ) ) ) ) cur, ( SELECT TagValue FROM T_HourData D WHERE A.TagName = D.TagName AND D.DataTime = ( SELECT MAX ( E.DataTime ) FROM dbo.T_HourData E WHERE D.tagname = E.tagname AND YEAR ( E.DataTime ) = YEAR ( DATEADD( YEAR, - 1, getDate( ) ) ) ) ) pre FROM T_HourData A GROUP BY TagName ) N WHERE M.tag_name = N.TagName AND M.[disable] != 1 AND M.total_flag = 1
